language.name: English(US) ‎
language.translation: This can be added to other emails using the [header] placeholder
This can be added to other emails using the [footer] placeholder

You have received this email because you are a member of [site-title]. This is a genuine email from [site-title]. However, if you receive an email which you are concerned does not legitimately originate from us, you can report before deleting it.

Legal

This email message is confidential and for use by the addressee only. If the message is received by anyone other than the addressee, please delete it from your computer. [site-title] does not accept responsibility for changes made to this message after it was sent.

Whilst all reasonable care has been taken to avoid the transmission of viruses, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that onward transmission, opening or use of this message and any attachments will not adversely affect its systems or data. No responsibility is accepted by [site-title] in this regard and the recipient should carry out such virus and other

Â© [site-title] [year]
This is forgot password email template sent when user want to reset password

[header]

Password reset

You have request for password reset. Please follow this link below to reset your password.

See post

[link]

[footer]
This is activation email template sent when user want first signup to your network
Welcome to [site-title] - Confirm your email address

[header]

Password reset

Thank you for joining our social network. Please follow the link or copy the code below to validate your email

Activate

[code]

[footer]
This is welcome email template sent when user want first signup to your network

[header]

Password reset

Thank you for joining our social network. Please follow the link below to log in to you account

Login

[login_link]

[footer]
This is friend request mail sent to users

[header]

Friend Request

You have a new friend request from [fullname]. Please follow the link below to respond to the friend request.

Respond to friend request

[link]

[footer]
This is mail sent to post owner when someone make a comment on it

[header]

Comment on post

You have a new comment from [fullname] on your post. Please follow the link below to see the post.

See post

[link]

[footer]
This is mail sent to photo owner when someone make a comment on it

[header]

Comment on photo

You have a new comment from [fullname] on your photo. Please follow the link below to see the photo.

See photo

[link]

[footer]
This is mail sent to profile owner when someone posted on his/her wall

[header]

Post on Timeline

[fullname] has posted on your timeline. Please follow the link below to see the post.

See post

[link]

[footer]
This is mail sent for friend request acceptance

[header]

Friend request accepted

[fullname] accepted your friend request. Please follow the link below to see the profile.

See post

[link]

[footer]
Welcome to our new social network
The :attribute must be a minimum of :min
The :attribute field must be a maximum of :max
The :attribute field must be a between :min and :max
The :attribute field can only consist of alphanumeric only
The :attribute field can only consist of integer only
The :attribute field can only consist of alphabets only
The :attribute field can only consist of numbers only
The :attribute field must be a valid url
The :attribute field must be a valid email
The :attribute field is not a valid date instance
The :attribute field is not a valid date/time instance
The value given is not accepted for :attribute field

Notification emails are sent to your users as they engage in different aspect of the community, with this form you can customize the emails

Enter the address you want the emails from the system to come from in the field

Enter your SMTP Username in the field
Enter your SMTP Password in the field
Set if you want to use ssl or tls in the dropdown
Select if you want to send immediately or after some time with email queue, please read about how to set up email queue from our official documentation
Use built in php mail() function
Notification emails are sent to your users as they engage in different aspect of the community, with this form you can customize the emails

TERMS OF SERVICE

Please read these terms of service carefully before accessing this software. Your access to and use of this software is conditioned in your acceptance of and compliance with these terms. These terms apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use this software.

Account:

Every buyer is responsible to secure and protect their account on our website. You are bound to fully responsible for all activities occur under the account and any other actions taken in connection with the account.

All license id's and domain informations are stored in our database but if our security personnel sees a problem with your license or website, they will immediately contact you through email. If the act found to be used in breach of the terms of use, our staff are authorized to suspend the license temporary advising you what action is required to resolve the matter, or in cases of a severe or repetitive problem, where advice has been ignored, revoke your license without refund and seek deletion of the software by your host server.

Support:

We have reliable support team ready to tackle any issue encounter while using the script. They are available in installing the software if you are unable to install it and in dealing with any error encountered during the use of unmodified software. i.e error cause by the script itself.

Note: Customization, professional installations, additional functionality, are not included in our freeÃÂ support.

Payment:ÃÂ 

We do not handle payment directly, but rather refers the payment to a secured third-party payment processor (BMTmicro) which handles all aspects of the payment process. Any payment issues or disputes should be resolved directly with the payment processor. When you make an order, we will be notified by the payment processor (BMTmicro) that a payment has been made that means the payment has successfully passed a fraud review, you will receive an automatic mail immediately and access to the dashboard will be granted for you to download the product.

This only applicable to the script and plugins, you will need to request for App setup if it was App you paid for unless if it was an App Enterpise plan which comes with source codes and can be downloaded immediately payment made and confirmed.

Upgrade:ÃÂ 

ÃÂ We shall provide enhancement to the product time to time in order to meet our customer's ambition. This enhancement shall include all modifications to the software including, but not limited to increase in speed, efficiency, security or ease of use of the software, or add additional capabilities or functionality to the software.

There is access to upgrade from x version to y version while upgrade license is still active. The purchase comes with one year free Upgrade license, You will need to extend it with token amount when it is expired only if you wish to download new update.
ÃÂ 

Newsletter:

If you request for a download link to crea8socialpro free trial version or you purchase a license of crea8socialpro, we will add your email address to our newsletter to keep you update in development, release and other relevant items. You are chance to unsubscribe from this mailing list at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link provided in the newsletter email messages.

ÃÂ

PRIVACY POLICY

It is Crea8social's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website. This Privacy Policy applies to https://demo.crea8social.com (hereinafter, "us", "we", or "https://demo.crea8social.com"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting personally identifiable information you may provide us through the Website. We have adopted this privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") to explain what information may be collected on our Website, how we use this information, and under what circumstances we may disclose the information to third parties. This Privacy Policy applies only to information we collect through the Website and does not apply to our collection of information from other sources.

This Privacy Policy, together with the Terms and conditions posted on our Website, set forth the general rules and policies governing your use of our Website. Depending on your activities when visiting our Website, you may be required to agree to additional terms and conditions.

Website Visitors

Like most website operators, Crea8social collects non-personally-identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. Crea8social's purpose in collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how Crea8social's visitors use its website. From time to time, Crea8social may release non-personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.

Crea8social also collects potentially personally-identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for logged in users and for users leaving comments on https://demo.crea8social.com blog posts. Crea8social only discloses logged in user and commenter IP addresses under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information as described below.

Gathering of Personally-Identifying Information

Certain visitors to Crea8social's websites choose to interact with Crea8social in ways that require Crea8social to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that Crea8social gathers depend on the nature of the interaction. For example, we ask visitors who sign up for a blog at https://demo.crea8social.com to provide a username and email address.

Security

The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Advertisements

Ads appearing on our website may be delivered to users by advertising partners, who may set cookies. These cookies allow the ad server to recognize your computer each time they send you an online advertisement to compile information about you or others who use your computer. This information allows ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you. This Privacy Policy covers the use of cookies by Crea8social and does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers.

Links To External Sites

Our Service may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy and the terms and conditions of every site you visit.

We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites, products or services.

Protection of Certain Personally-Identifying Information

Crea8social discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors, and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on Crea8social's behalf or to provide services available at Crea8social's website, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others. Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may be located outside of your home country; by using Crea8social's website, you consent to the transfer of such information to them. Crea8social will not rent or sell potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information to anyone. Other than to its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations, as described above, Crea8social discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only in response to a subpoena, court order or other governmental request, or when Crea8social believes in good faith that disclosure is reasonably necessary to protect the property or rights of Crea8social, third parties or the public at large.

If you are a registered user of https://demo.crea8social.com and have supplied your email address, Crea8social may occasionally send you an email to tell you about new features, solicit your feedback, or just keep you up to date with what's going on with Crea8social and our products. We primarily use our blog to communicate this type of information, so we expect to keep this type of email to a minimum. If you send us a request (for example via a support email or via one of our feedback mechanisms), we reserve the right to publish it in order to help us clarify or respond to your request or to help us support other users. Crea8social takes all measures reasonably necessary to protect against the unauthorized access, use, alteration or destruction of potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information.

Aggregated Statistics

Crea8social may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its website. Crea8social may display this information publicly or provide it to others. However, Crea8social does not disclose your personally-identifying information.

Cookies

To enrich and perfect your online experience, Crea8social uses "Cookies", similar technologies and services provided by others to display personalized content, appropriate advertising and store your preferences on your computer.

A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor's computer, and that the visitor's browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. Crea8social uses cookies to help Crea8social identify and track visitors, their usage of https://demo.crea8social.com, and their website access preferences. Crea8social visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using Crea8social's websites, with the drawback that certain features of Crea8social's websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.

By continuing to navigate our website without changing your cookie settings, you hereby acknowledge and agree to Crea8social's use of cookies.

Privacy Policy Changes

Although most changes are likely to be minor, Crea8social may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in Crea8social's sole discretion. Crea8social encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.

 

 

Credit & Contact Information

This privacy policy was created at termsandconditionstemplate.com. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via email or phone.

PRIVACY POLICY

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal information when you use this software.

The Data we collect

The personal data is any kind of data or information that can be considered personal (identifies an individual) like email address, first and last name, credit card information, address e.t.c

How do we Use the Data?

We use your data (personal information) for providing and improving what you want to make use, the information to complete the order you have placed. No sharing of your information with any individual or outside parties but to extent necessary to accomplish the order you have placed.

How do we secure the Data?

We protect your personal information, we take reasonable precaution and follow industry best practices to make sure it is not inappropriately lost, misused, accessed, disclosed, altered or destroyed. During purchase, we only collect necessary information to complete the transaction and after that is complete, the purchase transaction information is deleted.

Cookies

Cookies are files with small amount of data, which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on our computerÃ¢â¬â¢s hard drive. We use cookies to collect information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookies is been sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

ChildrenÃ¢â¬â¢s policy

Our service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. If we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will delete such information from our server immediately.

Change to This Privacy Policy

We may update our privacy policy from time to time, we will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page you are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any change and changes to this ÃÂ privacy policy are effective once they are posted here.

Aeromodelling is the activity of making working aircraft models on your own. Doing the projects on your own gives you a sense of achievement and excitement while improving your engineering skills.
hobby involving the appreciation, promotion, or breeding of pet or domestic animals.
Airbrushing is the act of using an airbrush tool to mix air and paint to create a fine mist that can be applied to nearly any surface.

A musical instrument is an instrument created or adapted to make musical sounds. In principle, any object that produces sound can be a musical instrumentÃ¢â¬âit is through purpose that the object becomes a musical instrument.
BASE jumping, also sometimes written as B.A.S.E. jumping, is parachuting or wingsuit flying from a fixed structure or cliff.

Windsurfing is a surface water sport that combines elements of surfing and sailing. It consists of a board usually 2.5 to 3 meters long, with displacements typically between 60 and 250 litres, powered by wind on a sail. The rig is connected to the board b
Baseball is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each, who take turns batting and fielding.
Sun tanning or simply tanning is the process whereby skin color is darkened or tanned.

Beachcombing is an activity that consists of an individual "combing" (or searching) the beach and the intertidal zone, looking for things of value, interest or utility. A beachcomber is a person who participates in the activity of beachcombing.
Beadwork is the art or craft of attaching beads to one another by stringing them with a sewing needle or beading needle and thread or thin wire, or sewing them to cloth.
Cycle polo is a team sport, similar to traditional polo, except that bicycles are used instead of horses.
BMX, an abbreviation for bicycle motocross, is a cycle sport performed on BMX bikes, either in competitive BMX racing or freestyle BMX, or else in general on- or off-road recreation.
Birdwatching, or birding, is a form of wildlife observation in which the observation of birds is a recreational activity.
Bodybuilding is the use of progressive resistance exercise to control and develop one's musculature.
Cloud watching is a fun hobby for children and adults alike. It is also one of the few hobbies that can be done without any equipmentÃ¢â¬âjust some spare time and a little imagination!
Customers gamble by playing games of chance, in some cases with an element of skill, such as craps, roulette, baccarat, blackjack, and video poker.
Canoeing is a sport or recreational activity which involves paddling a canoe with a single-bladed paddle.

Cheerleading ranges from chanting, to intense physical activity for sports team motivation, audience entertainment, or competition based upon organized routines. Competitive routines typically range anywhere from one to three minutes, and contain componen
Football is a family of team sports that involve, to varying degrees, kicking a ball with the foot to score a goal.
